item.title: 中国 CTG 据称将签署收购 Northleaf 西班牙太阳能发电厂的协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国三峡集团已同意从加拿大 Northleaf Capital Partners Ltd.手中收购西班牙一座 494 兆瓦的太阳能发电厂。【原文：China Three Gorges Corp. has agreed to buy a 494-megawatt solar plant in Spain from Canada’s Northleaf Capital Partners Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 德国 DAX 指数结束 2013 年以来最佳两年涨势
item.description: 德国主要股票基准指数创下十多年来最大的两年涨幅，令其欧洲竞争对手望尘莫及。【原文：Germany’s main equity benchmark concluded its biggest two-year run in more than a decade, leaving the country’s European rivals trailing in the dust.】

item.title: 高油价意味着欧洲消费者 2025 年的艰难开局
item.description: 今年，欧洲天然气价格上涨了约 45%，加重了家庭和工业的负担，因为他们正努力从几十年来最严重的生活成本危机中恢复过来。由于俄罗斯天然气将于 1 月 1 日停止供应，未来的涨幅可能会更大。【原文：European gas prices are up about 45% this year, adding to the burden on households and industry as they strive to recover from the worst cost-of-living crisis in decades. There’s likely to be more to come with Russian gas flows due to cease on Jan. 1.】

item.title: 在特朗普回归之前，加拿大人对经济越来越悲观
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税威胁给美国最大的贸易伙伴之一带来了不确定性，加拿大人对本国经济走向的乐观程度比一年多来都要低。【原文：Canadians are less optimistic about the direction of their economy than they’ve been in more than a year, as Donald Trump’s tariff threats create uncertainty for one of the largest US trading partners.】

item.title: 卡洛斯-斯利姆 2024 年投资 10 亿美元加大石油赌注
item.description: 卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）是拉丁美洲最富有的人，今年他投入了 10 亿美元用于扩大其原油生产和炼油投资组合，赌化石燃料的需求不会很快消失。【原文：Carlos Slim, Latin America’s richest man, plowed $1 billion this year into growing his crude-oil producing and refining portfolio in a bet that demand for fossil fuels isn’t going away anytime soon.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称降息步伐应循序渐进
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）认为，欧洲央行降低借贷成本应是 "渐进的"。【原文：The European Central Bank’s reductions in borrowing costs should be “gradual,” according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 投资者严查沙索公司战略，沙索公司将迎来最严重年度跌幅
item.description: 南非最大的燃料和化学品生产商沙索公司（Sasol Ltd. ）的股价将创下有史以来最差的年度表现，因为投资者正在权衡该公司降低环境和运营风险的计划。【原文：Sasol Ltd.’s shares are poised for their worst annual performance on record as investors weigh plans by South Africa’s biggest fuel and chemical maker to reduce environmental and operational risks.】

item.title: 可可市场重拾涨势，生产担忧挥之不去
item.description: 可可期货继 10 月份以来的最大单周跌幅之后重返涨势，原因是供应担忧继续推动价格昂贵的可可市场波动。【原文：Cocoa futures returned to gains following on the heels of the biggest weekly loss since October as supply fears continue to drive volatile swings on the pricey market.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯外国直接投资流入量下降，第四季度形势严峻
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯第三季度外国直接投资流入量下滑，这表明沙特在吸引外部资金支持其经济改革方面仍面临挑战。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s inflows of foreign direct investment slumped in the third quarter, a sign the kingdom continues to face challenges in drawing external cash to back its economic overhaul.】

item.title: 巴西分析师认为明年通胀率接近 5%，前景暗淡
item.description: 巴西经济学家将 2025 年通胀预期进一步上调至央行容忍范围的上限以上，凸显了决策者在承诺提高借贷成本时所面临的困境。【原文：Brazil economists raised their 2025 inflation forecasts further above the top of the central bank’s tolerance range, highlighting the woes facing policymakers as they pledge higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 博通的繁荣与英特尔的衰落展示了芯片业竞争的另一面
item.description: 在过去的一年里，芯片行业有成功也有失败。但首先...【原文：The chip industry saw major successes and failures during the past year. But first...】

item.title: 2025 年全球贸易面临从关税到罢工的逆风
item.description: 我是伦敦的经济编辑布伦丹-默里（Brendan Murray）。今天我们关注全球贸易的未来一年。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Brendan Murray, an economics editor in London. Today we’re looking at the year ahead for global trade. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 进入 2025 年，洛杉矶港进口量激增
item.description: 美国最繁忙的港口将在 2025 年之前处理大量进口商品，因为各家公司都在努力应对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收的关税，以及可能导致美国东半部贸易门户关闭的罢工。【原文：The busiest port in the US is heading until 2025 handling a flurry of imports as companies try to beat President-elect Donald Trump’s tariffs on Chinese goods and a strike that threatens to shut trade gateways on the eastern half of the country.】

item.title: 银行内部人员泄露客户账户数据，诈骗案激增
item.description: 这名新员工本应帮助多伦多道明银行发现来自纽约前哨的洗钱活动。【原文：The new staffer was supposed to help Toronto-Dominion Bank spot money laundering from an outpost in New York.】

item.title: 印度央行称，到 2026 年印度银行不良贷款率将进一步恶化
item.description: 印度储备银行在一份报告中称，由于资产估值捉襟见肘、公共债务居高不下以及长期的地缘政治冲突给金融稳定带来风险，印度银行的不良贷款率在降至多年低点后预计将进一步恶化。【原文：Bad loan ratios in Indian banks are expected to worsen after falling to multi-year lows as stretched asset valuations, high public debt and prolonged geopolitical conflicts pose risks to financial stability, the Reserve Bank of India said in a report.】

item.title: 华尔街股票预言家 2024 年猝不及防
item.description: 明年哪些资产表现最佳？让我们一起参与市场脉搏调查。【原文：Which assets will fare the best next year? Let us know and take the Markets Pulse survey.】

item.title: 阿达尼计划出资 20 亿美元退出与新加坡威玛的合资企业
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）将以 20 亿美元的多阶段交易方式退出在孟买上市的阿达尼-威尔玛有限公司（Adani Wilmar Ltd.），出售其在双方的消费合资企业中的股份，阿达尼集团的旗舰企业将重点转向其核心基础设施业务。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani will exit from Mumbai-listed Adani Wilmar Ltd. in a $2 billion multi-phased deal by selling its stake in their consumer joint venture as Adani Group’s flagship turns focus to its core infrastructure businesses.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦-荷兰鸡蛋公司希望通过首次公开募股将产量提高 71
item.description: 巴基斯坦最大的蛋制品生产商 Barkat Frisian Agro Ltd. 正计划在下个月进行首次公开募股，一位商业银行家表示，股市的上涨使这个南亚国家成为 2024 年亚洲表现最好的国家。【原文：Pakistan’s largest egg products manufacturer Barkat Frisian Agro Ltd. is planning an initial public offering next month, a merchant banker said, amid a stock market rally that has made the South Asian nation the best performer in Asia for 2024.】

item.title: 诺华公司称新药有助于治疗儿童罕见脊柱疾病
item.description: 诺华公司（Novartis AG）称，在一项高级研究中，一种新的实验性药物改善了一种脊髓性肌萎缩症患儿的运动功能。【原文：Novartis AG said a new experimental medicine improved motor function in children with a form of spinal muscular atrophy, the devastating disorder targeted by its gene therapy Zolgensma, in an advanced study.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉因埃尔多安加息言论而下滑，落后于新兴市场货币指数
item.description: 土耳其里拉是周一表现最差的新兴市场货币，因为土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安对利率的评论加剧了人们对他恢复过去所支持的非常规货币政策的担忧。【原文：The Turkish lira was the worst-performing emerging-market currency on Monday, as President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s comment on interest rates fanned concerns about a return to the unconventional monetary policies he has espoused in the past.】

item.title: 印度股市散户投资者资金流将创年度新高
item.description: 印度股市将迎来有史以来最大的小投资者年度流入量，这凸显了他们对股票的持续热爱。【原文：India’s stock market is on pace to receive the biggest annual inflow ever from small investors, underscoring their continuing love affair with equities.】

item.title: 土耳其西姆塞克誓言通过增税实现通胀目标
item.description: 土耳其国库和财政部长穆罕默德-西姆塞克（Mehmet Simsek）表示，土耳其不会因为提高燃料和烟草税而削弱明年的通胀预期。【原文：Turkey won’t undermine next year’s inflation forecast when increasing taxes on fuel and tobacco, Treasury and Finance Minister Mehmet Simsek said.】

item.title: 奇乐在 2024 年学到的 10 件最有趣的事（播客）
item.description: 2024 年即将过去，特雷西和乔再次回顾《奇点》过去的一年。在今年的最后一集中，我们重温了过去 12 个月中节目中出现的 10 个最吸引人、最令人惊讶、最难忘的事实和观点，从鸡肉价格到镍矿开采，再到私人融资，无所不谈。【原文：As 2024 comes to an end, Tracy and Joe once again look back at the year that was in Odd Lots. On this final episode of the year, we revisit 10 of the most fascinating, surprising and unforgettable facts and ideas that came up on the show in the last 12 months, talking about everything from chicken prices to nickel mining to private finance.】

item.title: 交易员关注通胀和欧洲央行利率，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 欧洲股市在 2024 年倒数第二个交易日开盘时下跌，这一年该地区股市涨幅不大，与华尔街的牛市涨势形成鲜明对比。【原文：European stocks fell at the open of the penultimate trading session of 2024, a year of modest gains for the region that contrasted with the bullish Wall Street rally.】

item.title: 越南盾兑美元汇率跌至历史新低
item.description: 在越南中央银行调低汇率后，越南货币兑美元汇率跌至历史新低。【原文：Vietnam’s currency fell to a record low against the dollar after the central bank set the fixing lower.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特称贸易战可能将中国通缩输出到欧洲
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，如果美国通过征收新关税挑起贸易战，中国可能会开始以折扣价向欧洲出售产品。【原文：China may start selling its products to Europe at discounted rates if the US starts a trade war by imposing new tariffs, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot.】

item.title: 过境协议还剩数日，欧洲天然气价格仍在波动
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格徘徊在本月最高水平附近，原因是储存量消耗速度快于正常水平，而且乌克兰-俄罗斯天然气过境协议即将结束。【原文：European natural gas prices hovered near the highest level this month as storage levels deplete faster-than-normal and the end looms for the Ukraine-Russia gas transit agreement.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "将为乌克兰提供天基移动服务
item.description: 乌克兰最大的移动运营商 Kyivstar PJSC 与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司签署了一项协议，在这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家引入由卫星驱动的蜂窝服务，以期将电信基础设施置于俄罗斯的攻击范围之外。【原文：Kyivstar PJSC, Ukraine’s largest mobile operator, signed a deal with Elon Musk’s Starlink to introduce satellite-powered cellular service in the war-torn country in a bid to place telecom infrastructure beyond the reach of Russian attacks.】

item.title: 西班牙通胀加速，支持欧洲央行逐步降息
item.description: 西班牙本月通胀率升幅超过预期，在基数效应的影响下连续第二个月保持在 2% 以上，为逐步降息提供了支持。【原文：Spanish inflation quickened more than anticipated this month, staying above 2% for a second month on base effects and supporting the case for gradual interest-rate cuts.】
